EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: Honeywell Operators Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell Operators Conference in Mumbai. Event: Honeywell Operators Conference
Date: October 15th, 2018
Location: Hotel ITC Maratha, Sahar Road, Opposite Chhatrapati Shivaji Airport, Andheri East, Mumbai 400 099 (Maharashtra)
Please contact us at Jiri.Huml@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Jiri.Huml@Honeywell.com]]> with any questions.
We look forward to meeting you during our event.
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
